definition: to emerge victorious in every battle/to be ever-victorious
surname Bai
hundred/numerous/all kinds of
to fight/fight/war/battle
surname Bai
hundred/numerous/all kinds of

victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)

sentences.english: He is nearly ever successful on the market, ever-victorious.
sentences.chinese: 他在商场上几乎无往不利，百战百胜。

sentences.english: His Troglodyte hordes are feared the world over, especially in the dark tunnels of Nighon.
sentences.chinese: 他的洞穴人军队在尼根黑暗的坑道中百战百胜。

sentences.english: This psychological tactics used properly, without the.
sentences.chinese: 这种心理战术运用得当，无不百战百胜。

definition: to come unscathed through a hundred battles (idiom, from Sunzi's "The Art of War" 孫子兵法|孙子兵法[Sun1 zi3 Bing1 fa3]); to win every fight
know yourself, know your enemy (idiom, from Sunzi's "The Art of War" 孫子兵法|孙子兵法[Sun1 zi3 Bing1 fa3])
to know the enemy and know oneself (idiom, from Sunzi's "The Art of War")
know yourself and know your enemy, and you will never be defeated (idiom, from Sunzi's "The Art of War" 孫子兵法|孙子兵法[Sun1 zi3 Bing1 fa3])
pinyin: zhi1 ji3 zhi1 bi3 , bai3 zhan4 bu4 dai4

definition: to triumph in every battle and win every fight (idiom); all-conquering/ever victorious/nothing they can't do
pinyin: gong1 wu2 bu4 ke4 , zhan4 wu2 bu4 sheng4

definition: to triumph in every battle (idiom); invincible/to succeed in every undertaking
to lead military operations with extraordinary skill
to be able to plan victory from a thousand miles away (idiom)
to catch an enemy off guard with a surprise attack (idiom, from Sunzi's "The Art of War" 孫子兵法|孙子兵法[Sun1 zi3 Bing1 fa3])
pinyin: chu1 qi2 bu4 yi4 , gong1 qi2 bu4 bei4

definition: there can never be too much deception in war/in war nothing is too deceitful/all's fair in war
a general planning in the seclusion of his tent is able to determine the outcome of the distant battle (idiom)
pinyin: yun4 chou2 wei2 wo4 zhi1 zhong1 , jue2 sheng4 qian1 li3 zhi1 wai4
related.word: 运筹帷幄之中，决胜千里之外

definition: art of war/military strategy and tactics
to be invincible/unrivalled
to be successful in every endeavor
lit. to devise battle plan in a tent (idiom)/fig. planning strategies
using the weak to defeat the strong (idiom); to win from a position of weakness
